description: [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) uses [Prestige](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1058) to delete the backup catalog from the target system using: `C:\Windows\System32\wbadmin.exe delete catalog -quiet` and to delete volume shadow copies using: `C:\Windows\System32\vssadmin.exe delete shadows /all /quiet`. (Citation: Microsoft Prestige ransomware October 2022)

external_references.description: MSTIC. (2022, October 14). New “Prestige” ransomware impacts organizations in Ukraine and Poland. Retrieved January 19, 2023.
